title: Introducing: keii
body:
In a year when P C Music has made a pop star of an energy drink and churned out auto-tuned hit after hit, there’s really no saying where pop meets cheesy anymore.

Sixteen year old **keii** (pronounced _kay_) purposefully leaves his identity as ambiguous, with a [Tumblr](http://hikeii.tumblr.com/) chock-a-block with colourful, apparently unassociated images, and his Soundcloud only featuring an absolute bonkers remix of Childish Gambino’s Sweatpants, a seemingly Skrillex inspired mash-up, and his recent ‘single, _relapse / fracture_. Everything about his music is energetic, brash, vibrant, off the wall and ultimately completely batshit insane, yet deliriously brilliant. I can’t even begin to work out where the samples are lifted from, and perhaps for the best, perhaps it would remove some of the magic. Check out _fracture_, _relapse_ and his Childish Gambino remix below.
